      • loop

        protected void loop()
        Description copied from class: Loop
        The looping cod. call Loop.next(Object) inside the loop to invoke the code of this loop. Break the loop if it returned false.
        Specified by:
        loop in class Loop<java.util.function.BiConsumer<Foreach<I>,I>,I>
